description: Number of partitions of n with equal number of parts congruent to each of 0, 1 and 2 (mod 3).
mathematica: Table[Length[Select[Last /@ Transpose /@ Tally /@ Mod[IntegerPartitions[n], 3], Length[#] == 3 && Length[Union[#]] == 1 &]], {n, 50}] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jun 28 2013 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
